mapper.select: select * from (select rownum as rnum,a.* from (select notice.idx,notice.writedate,notice.deadline,notice.subject,notice.com_name,plan.plan_name period,(select count(*)from apply where notice_idx=notice.idx) ref,(select count(*)from apply where notice_idx=notice.idx and "APPLY"."CHECK"=0) recruit from notice,plan,apply where notice.com_idx=#{idx} and notice.plan_idx=plan.idx and notice.idx=apply.notice_idx and notice.status='활성' order by notice.idx desc) a) b where rnum>=#{start} and rnum<=#{end}
select count(*) from notice where com_idx=#{idx} and status='활성'
select * from notice where idx=#{idx} and status='활성'
mapper.update: update notice set status='비활성' where idx=#{idx}
